greeting: <es name='Yawn_02' />  Oh! Hello, <participant-name>! So nice to see you again. <es name='affection_05' /> Looking at you reminds me it's dance time! <es name='Groovy_music_dance_01' /> That was fun. <break size='1.0' />  <es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'> Oh, look! <break size='1.0'/> It's your robot </es>. We are ready to go play together in the playground this time!<es name='Emoji_Sun' />

all: Oh, it looks like someone hid all the flags in a secret place, and we need to find them. <es cat='sad' />
c-g-: <es cat='question'> Will you help me find different <prize-name>s here?</es> <break size='1.0' /> <es name='SpinHead_01' /> Let's discover together what there is in the playground.
c-g+: <es cat='question'> Will you help me find different <prize-name>s here?</es> <break size='1.0' /> <es name='SpinHead_01' /> Let's discover together what there is in the playground.
c+g-: <es cat='curious'>I wonder how many <prize-name>s there are in the playground?</es><break size='0.5'/> <es cat='question'> Will you help me find different <prize-name> here?<break size='1.0' /> <es name='SpinHead_01' /> Let's discover together what there is in the playground.
c+g+: <es cat='curious'>I wonder how many <prize-name>s there are in the playground?</es><break size='0.5'/> <es cat='question'> Will you help me find different <prize-name> here?<break size='1.0' /> <es name='SpinHead_01' /> Let's discover together what there is in the playground.

all: Do you remember all those <es cat='gift'> magical treasure boxes</es>? <break size='0.5' /> In each treasure box, we will find exactly what we are looking for,<break size='0.2' />if we can open it by solving a puzzle. <break size='0.5' /> There is also a puzzle <es name='Emoji_Question'> behind the question mark, but we cannot see it until we select it. <break size='0.5' />first we need to choose </es>which box to try to open. I will try first, but because I have no hands, I will <es name='Emoji_Brain'> use my brain power to move things on the screen!</es><break size='1.0/>
c-g-: <es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'>hmm.. <break size='1.0'/>I will choose this one.</es>
c-g+: <es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'>hmm.. <break size='1.0'/>I will choose this one, </es> because it looks challenging! <es cat='happy' />
c+g-: I wonder who made the treasure boxes. <break size='0.5'/><es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'>hmm.. <break size='1.0'/>I will choose this one, because I can learn from it.</es>
c+g+: I wonder who made the treasure boxes. <break size='0.5'/><es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'>hmm.. <break size='1.0'/>I will choose this one, because it looks challenging </es>and I can learn a lot from it. <es cat='happy' />

tangram_tutorial: Oh, look! these puzzles are made of <es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'> pieces of different shapes. we need to find where to put them </es> to fill in the black area.  <break size='0.5'/>Like last time, we have two minutes to try, <es name='Emoji_Clock'> until the sand in the hourglass runs out, <break size='0.5'/>but we </es>need to try even faster so we are in time for the party! <break size='0.5' /> First, watch me and then you take a turn.

all: We found so many <prize-name>s! <es name = 'affection_01'> Way to go, <participant-name>! <es name='SpinHead_01' />
<es name='Yawn_01' > Okay, I feel very tired after digging up those flags from the playground. Nap time, it is. <break size='1.0' /> Chao! </es>

question1: <es cat='question'/>I wonder how long Zoy's tale is.
question2: <es cat='curious'/>I wonder how long the winter is.
question3: <es cat='question'/>It would be so interesting to know how tall the world's tallest tree is.
question4: <es cat='curious'/>I wonder what kind of tree these nuts grow on. <break size='0.5'/>triangle? <break size='0.5'/>or square?
question5: <es cat='question'/>I how many nuts Zoy can eat
question6: <es cat='curious'/>I am curious what Zoy does in the winter.

ask_question_party: <es cat='question'>I wonder if every year has four seasons?</es>
